ref: 1657 ucchēdayati ʻ causes to be destroyed ʼ Pañcat. [úcchi- natti ʻ cuts off ʼ AV., Pa. ucchindati ʻ destroys ʼ, Pk. ucchiṁdaï; Pa. ucchēdana -- ʻ destroying ʼ, Pk. ucchēyaṇa<-> n. ʻ destruction ʼ: √chid]

P. uchehṇā, uchih˚ ʻ to separate the skin, scratch ʼ; <-> deriv. ucchṇā ʻ to be scratched ʼ or < *ucchyati.
